long_description: Men's Marmot Speed Light Pants are for serious outdoor enthusiasts and shelter you from the elements with extraordinary GORE-TEX(R) Pro weather protection in a technical yet lightweight design. Waterproof, breathable 3-layer GORE-TEX Pro nylon fabric is micro-stitched and seam taped for maximum waterproof protection. Reinforced seat and knees protect against abrasion; Cordura(R) scuff guards protect against crampons and boot wear. Adjustable suspenders enhance the fit; drop seat and zippered fly provide convenience. Articulated knees aid in fit, allowing freedom of movement. Water-resistant side zippers ease on/off. Hand pockets also feature water-resistant zippers. Marmot Speed Light Pants for men have a snap-closure waist with elastic in the back for comfort.
